content.title: Driven
content.content: We are a group of highly motivated MU students, all working to help Miami Engineering be the best that it can be.

content.title: Committed
content.content: We are working hard to make sure that Miami's Engineering programs can operate at their fullest potential, and be of the most benefit to students.

content.title: Scholarly
content.content: Every member of CECSC is committed to not just their own scholarly excellence, but to improving others through knowledge.

content.title: Representatives
content.content: Every department of the Engineering school: CSE, ECE, MME, and CPB are all represented here.
